title: WTT: T206 Cobb Bat on Shoulder
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: WTT: T206 Cobb Bat on Shoulder
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,

I recently acquired a t206 bat on shoulder. It's in poor condition and currently at SGC being authenticated/graded (should be back next week). I'd like to float the idea of trading it potentially for one of the following:

Cobb Bat off shoulder
Cobb red portrait
Cobb green portrait
Johnson portrait
Mathewson portrait
Young portrait

To be honest, I'd be the most excited/willing to trade it for another Cobb (and offset any difference with cash necessary)

Please email me at [url]wazywhoa@gmail.com[/url] for pics so we can discuss further. Thank you!

Wazoo

Email sent

Sent from my SM-G960U using Tapatalk
